did.head: Collection Summary

physdesc.label: Collection Size
physdesc.extent: 170 manuscript boxes, 1 card file box, 2 phonotape reels

did.abstract: Correspondence, memoranda, reports, press releases, resolutions, petitions, financial records, printed matter, and audiovisual material, relating to Polish Americans, conditions in Poland, official and unofficial relations between the United States and Poland, and grant and charitable aid to Poland.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Polish American Congress records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2013.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Polish American Congress is a federation of Polish-American organizations in the United States. Included in the Polish American Congress are more than 3,000 independent Polish American organizations, consisting of fraternal, veteran, cultural and professional groups, religious societies and social associations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, memoranda, reports, press releases, resolutions, petitions, financial records, printed matter, and audiovisual material, relating to Polish Americans, conditions in Poland, official and unofficial relations between the United States and Poland, and grant and charitable aid to Poland.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in groups by the creator.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Polish Americans.

did.unittitle: National Endowment for Democracy (NED)/Polish-American Enterprise Fund (PAEF)

National Endowment for Democracy (NED) and Polish-American Enterprise Fund (PAEF)
Polish American Congress Charitable Foundation (PACCF), National Endowment for Democracy (NED), and Polish-American Enterprise Fund (PAEF)
